name: Cold Weld
description:
A relaxing, abstract, voxel-style puzzle platformer about connecting different puzzle pieces together to move across a strange level. Only a few minutes of gameplay long.

Twitter handle in start/help screen is wrong!!! @cow_trix

*Controls:*

Press "H" to exit the controls at the start and hold it at any time to see it again.

WASD / Arrow keys: Move

Q/E: Rotate

Move into orange block faces to connect your player with them.
